subject: Horses in Japan
msgSnippet: Horses had been in Japan since well before the Mongol invasions. However, I believe the evidence shows that they were not native to Japan. I can t remember off

Horses had been in Japan since well before the Mongol invasions. 
However, =
I believe the evidence shows that they were not native to 
Japan. I can't r=
emember off the top of my head when horses were 
introduced to Japan though=
. I believe that they are in some of the 
earliest chronicles about Japan f=
rom China though. And I think those 
date from the 3rd century CE or so. Bu=
t bones seem to indicate that 
even though they were there a long time ago =
they were originally 
brought from the contiinent.
